thread.title: Providing for your pets after you’re gone

title: Providing for your pets after you’re gone
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Living - Today 
To ensure care for your pets after you pass, consult an estate attorneyPets can’t inherit money, so you’ll need to set up a pet trustPet...
